testcase.name: Verify that Mandate Interchange are successfully created using Create Mandate Intercahnege API
Verify that user can retrieve the Mandate Interchange using mandateInterchangeKey
Verify that user can retrieve the Mandate Interchange with query parameters
Verify that Mandate Interchange is successfully updated using PUT request to updateMandateInterchangeAPI
Verify that 404 statuscode is displayed on GET request for getMandateInterchangeWithQueryParamsAPI when no data found
Verify that 404 statuscode is displayed on GET request for getMandateInterchangeWithKeyAPI when no data found
Verify that GET request to getMandateInterchangeWithQueryParamsAPI with incorrect query params returns 500 statuscode
